LCS2 Achievements

  • March 13, 2019
    1. Aditya Chetan has received a visiting opportunity at the Max Planck Institute for Informatics, Saarbrücken. He will be working in Department 5 (D5) - Databases and Information Systems in the broad areas of NLP and Data Mining.
    2. Brihi Joshi has received the Snap Research Scholarship 2019. She has been awarded a scholarship as well as an internship opportunity at Snap Inc. Research, LA. She’s one of the 8 scholars selected globally and the only one from India! Further details
  • January 09, 2019
    Brihi Joshi has been awarded an ACM-W scholarship to attend WSDM 2019.
  • November 28, 2018
    Aditya Chetan receives travel grant from Google to attend WSDM 2019.
  • November 21, 2018
    Hridoy Sankar Dutta receives student travel grant to attend CoDS-COMAD 2019.
  • October 20, 2018
    LCS2 Member Lavina Jain has been given a Software Engineering internship opportunity with Facebook London for Summers 2019.
  • September 21, 2018
    Dr. Tanmoy receives “Google India Faculty Award” (Domain: Data Mining and Modeling).
  • September 20, 2018
    Brihi Joshi, 3rd year UG student and an LCS2 member has been awarded the Google Women Techmakers Scholarship, 2018. It contains a $1000 award and a retreat to the Singapore office of Google, all expenses paid.
  • September 12, 2018
    Hridoy Sankar Dutta has been selected to attend the Young Scientists’ Conference at India International Science Festival 2018, Lucknow where he will be presenting a poster on his work on Collusion in Online Social Networks.
  • September 12, 2018
    Brihi Joshi has been awarded a scholarship to attend the Grace Hopper Celebration India, 2018. It is produced by AnitaB.org India and presented in partnership with ACM India.
  • September 12, 2018
    Brihi Joshi, 3rd year UG student and an LCS2 member has been awarded the Google Women Techmakers Scholarship, 2018. It contains a $1000 award and a retreat to the Singapore office of Google, all expenses paid.
  • September 08, 2018
    LCS2 members received several awards for their achievements at the 10th Foundation Day celebration of IIIT Delhi.
    Dean’s List of Academic Affairs: Dattatreya Mohapatra, Vishal Raj Dutta, Pulkit Madaan, Viresh Gupta, Sarthika Dhawan
    Dean’s List of Student Affairs: Lavina Jain, Baani Leen Kaur Jolly
    Dean’s Award for Innovation, Research and Development: Brihi Joshi, Aditya Chetan
    Teaching Awards: Dr. Tanmoy Chakraborty (Both Monsoon 2017 and Winter 2018)
  • September 01, 2018
    LCS2 member Brihi Joshi was recently acknowledged by the Women Who Code weekly newsletter - CODE Review, for her contribution in her first academic paper that was accepted at ASONAM 2018.
  • July 30, 2018
    Dr. Tanmoy has received an “unconstrained faculty award” from Financials Markets Technology start-up Egregore Labs.
  • July 10, 2018
    Our group intern Pranay Mukherjee becomes one of the contributors of NLTK. He introduced a new distance metric Jaro Winkler distance to the NLTK package. His contribution is listed as an awesome contribution by NLTK maintainers. PR Link
  • June 19, 2018
    Shivangi Singhal, a PhD student of Dr. Rajiv Ratn Shah and Dr. Tanmoy Chakraborty, has got selected for attending the ACM India Grad Cohort 2018. Only 50 students were selected for this event. https://www.cse.iitb.ac.in/~acmindiacohort/
  • May 18, 2018
    Ayush Agarwal received PAKDD Student Travel Award. Only 10 students have been awarded the same.
  • May 04, 2018
    Dr. Tanmoy received Early Career Research Award
  • April 28, 2018
    Dr. Tanmoy received best reviewer award at WWW’18

Laboratory for Computation Social Systems (LCS2) at Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology, Delhi (IIIT-Delhi)
